lead_paragraph: Starbucks said sales rose 9 percent in the United States, with consumers buying $1.9 billion-worth of gift cards. But sales growth slowed overseas.

headline.print_headline: Strong U.S. Sales at Starbucks, but Outlook Disappoints
headline.main: Strong U.S. Sales at Starbucks, but Outlook Disappoints

snippet: Starbucks said sales rose 9 percent in the United States, with consumers buying $1.9 billion-worth of gift cards. But sales growth slowed overseas.
abstract: Starbucks reports quarterly profit of $687.6 million, or 46 cents a share; reports sales rose 9 percent, with customers buying $1.9 billion in chain's gift cards.
